name: Fancy Coming Soon & Maintenance Mode
author: WPKube

sections.installation:
1. The plugin will automatically display the coming soon banner
  2. All of the options for the plugin are located under Apperance > Customize > Fancy Coming Soon Settings
  3. Your mailchimp Signup URL can be found by following these directions: http://kb.mailchimp.com/lists/signup-forms/share-your-signup-form
sections.faq:
1. To disable your coming soon banner, navigation to Plugins and de-activate your Fancy Coming Soon Plugin for WordPress. This will disable the banner.
  2. You can disable the theme options previewer under Apperance > Customize > Fancy Coming Soon Settings > General > Preview Coming Soon Page?
sections.changelog:
1.4.4

  • Options to add custom HTML code before and before tags.
  • Option to force logo image to be loaded over HTTPS
  • Fixed alt tag on logo image

1.4.3

  • Instagram and Whatsapp added to the social elements
  • Social elements no longer required

1.4.2

  • WordPress 5.4 compatibility bump

1.4.0

  • WordPress 5.x compatibility
  • Added settings link in the listing on WP admin > Plugins
  • Fixed issue with subscribers ( regular users ) seeing the website instead of the coming soon page
  • Option to switch text to dark colors ( when background is light )
  • The settings are now stored in options instead of theme_mod, because theme_mod is based on the active theme, if theme is changed settings go back to defaults
  • Added a note for the administrator ( when in Customizer ) saying that they are seeing the coming soon page so they can make adjustments to it and that they can disable it in the General settings
  • Added a message in the WP admin after plugin activation saying that if caching plugin is used the cache should be cleared
  • Switched icons to FontAwesome
  • General code cleanup and improvements

1.3.0

Add Option to remove text in logo
Added a custom link in Appearance section

1.2.0

MailChimp Signup form

1.0.1

Bug-Fix for MailChimp Sign up form URL Added link to options under Appearance > Coming Soon Settings Updated File: /inc/templates/fancy-customizer.php

1.0.0

Initial Commit
sections.description:
Fancy Coming soon is a free WordPress plugin that allows you to create coming soon page qucikly via Live Customizer.

Easily work on your site while the plugin takes care of collecting your vistiors’ email.

Features

  • Beautiful Design
  • Works with all WordPress themes
  • MailChimp Integration
  • Quick and super easy to setup
  • Social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter, and email)
  • and more

This plugin is currenlty maintained and supported by WPKube and works with all the popular free themes. If you are looking to switch your current hosting provider, here’s a quick guide on Best WordPress Hosting (based on real research).

Credits

Design by Jason Schuller and Code by WPKube.
